MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Riverside Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.26pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.05pm on the 24th January 2021.
